original_title: Sri Lanka hikes fuel prices after VAT
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka has hiked diesel and petrol prices with effect from January 01, but reduced kerosene, Ceylon Petroleum Corporation said, as value added taxes go into effect in 2024.
Sri Lanka officials had said petrol and diesel would be subject to value added tax from January 01 but kerosene and electricity would be exempt.
